name: Fusion Fort
description: Fusion Fort is a strategy hyper-casual game in which you goal is to maximize your score by killing as many attackers as you can and collecting as much cash as possible. You have to strategize you defenses you can fuse your similar weapons and create  new ones. You can collect cash and buy new weapons as well. But beware, all weapons can be used for a limit time only and you have to place them accordingly. Mainly targeted for android, this game is playable on both windows and android. Please provide your feedback so I may continue this game till the finish.
